name: DuckTouch
description:
CONTROLS: Move with WASD or Arrow Keys.
Turn On/Off the Magnet with Space Key

Pick up the Ducks with the Magnet of the Drone, the wire has green lights when Turned ON and yellow when Turned OFF. You have 1 minute the drop all of them in the Right Side of the Machine to make 5 points each. Additionally each second is 1 point when you finish all Ducks.

This game, all the pixel art and program logic, was made for the Trijam 155 with the theme "Gameplay under 1 minute!" in 3 hours and 20 minutes. Inspired by the 5th Episode of Drawtectives from Drawfee.
Unfortunately, we didn't have enough time to put different points to each duck and the hats, but you can see what they would look like in the banner.

Art: Marcelo Rossato (twitter)
Program: Rodrigo Pereira (twitter)   

Sound effects credits:
Sounds at zapsplat.com
